Text:
Runtime:  113 min???
the proper Runtime is 191 min.

ok, i just downloaded one of the two DMT rips that have been posted. the quality looks good. as for the runtime, if you had seen grindhouse you would know it was two separate films. here, death proof is complete running at 113 min (i think an extended version). planet terror, the other feature is not included. and i dont think it will be out for a little while judging by the dvd release information on amazon. i hope that helps and thanks to the uploader.
Quality is very good, the movie is the complete Death Proof. recommended d/l
